meanings.definition: Already wired or equipped with wiring before installation.
meanings.sent1: The prewired alarm system made installation quick and easy.
meanings.sent2: The new house came with prewired speakers in every room.
meanings.sent3: I felt like a prewired robot with all the cables attached to me.
meanings.sent4: Her brain seemed prewired to solve complex puzzles effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The prewired Christmas lights illuminated the entire street beautifully.

meanings.definition: To wire or equip with wiring before installation.
meanings.sent1: The electrician prewired the entire house for the new lighting system.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to prewire the speakers before mounting them on the wall.
meanings.sent3: I prewired the garden lights, but now they won't stop flickering!
meanings.sent4: She prewired her laptop with extra cooling fans for better performance.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic prewired the car stereo for seamless integration.
